span.style: font-family: Comic Sans MS; font-weight: normal; color: #550000; font-style: normal
font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 焦虑：anxiety arising from awareness of guilt
【例】Mr Linton stood looking at her in sudden compunction and fear.
【例】a brutal murderer who killed without compunction
【近】anxiety, misgiving, scruple
【反】absence of misgiving 不担忧
【记】 com + puncture (心里)被很多针一起扎的感觉→懊悔
【另】 acupuncture 针灸，expunction 消除，消灭，venipuncture 静脉穿刺
